name: @zedvision/smart-monaco-editor
description: Monaco Editor with auto type downloads mostly for React

scripts.prebuild: yarn clean && tsc && cp -ar dist ../code/modules/smart-monaco-editor/ && deno fmt src
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && yarn format &&  rm -rf ../code/js/smart-monaco-editor && mkdir -p ../code/modules/smart-monaco-editor
